Missions.Full Rush: All players must hold the W key at all times.
Missions.Wall of china: All players align in a horizontal line at a designated spot in the map and not move until the round is over.
Missions.Get down Mr. President: One player is the president and must be protected at all costs. All other players must follow the president and protect them. The president must plant/defuse the bomb. If the president dies, the round is lost (kill yourselves).
Missions.Oooh shiny: All players must inspect their gun before being allowed to fire.
Missions.MLG Clip farming: All players must jump and turn 360 degrees before being allowed to shoot.
Missions.Pussy mode: All players must hide in the same corner.
Missions.Pump it: All players must do a pushup every time they weapon needs reloading.
Missions.Martyrdom: When a player dies, they must make a very exagerated death noise for at least 5 seconds.
Missions.Double switcheroo: All players must tell the enemy team the site they will be going to and have to go to that site.
Missions.Blind bumrush: All players must buy flashes, players must harass an enemy player with flashes.
Missions.Smoke carpet: All players must buy a smoke and create a tunnel through mid. Then they must run through it.
Missions.Butter fingers: All players must drop their gun every 10 seconds and get a different gun (can be the same type).
Missions.Tactical monkeys: All players must communicate as if they were a SWAT team.
Missions.Cleptomania: Every time a weapon/gadget is found on the ground, it must be picked up.
Missions.Prone to error: All players must give non-sensical callouts or lie, if somebody gives a real callout they must be executed.
Missions.Infamous Turk: All players must buy a Nova and rage at every opportunity they can.
Missions.Clear comms: All players must describe all their actions at all times.
Missions.Fuck Megaknight: All players must make noises as if they were in Clash Royale.
Missions.Low-budget dubbing: All players must mute their game volume and voice over the games noises.
Missions.Fire in the hole: All players must buy full utility and throw it as soon as they see an enemy.
Missions.Zappy assault: All players must buy a Zeus, if the player fails to get a Zeus kill, they must hit 10 squats.
Missions.Minute of silence: As soon as this prompt shows, all players must remain silent until the end of the round. If they fail to do so they must send in a slutty selfie in the groupchat.
Missions.5AM Experience: All players must sneak around the map and whisper.
Missions.COD 4 Bootcamp: All players must switch to their secondary weapon before being allowed to reload.
Missions.FNAF.exe: All players must get jump scared whenever they see an enemy (jump and scream).
Missions.Directionally challenged: All players must put their headset on the wrong way.
Missions.Boppelg√§nger effect: One player is designated as the original, all other players must mimic all their actions in and outside the game.
Missions.Emergency room: Only one player is allowed to get out of spawn at a time, the remaining players can only leave one by one once the next player dies.
Missions.Ambidextrous: All players must exchange their mouse and keyboards placement.
Missions.Pose for the camera: All players must have their webcam on. Every 15 seconds all players must strike a pose for their camera.
Missions.Spinjutsu: All players must max out their sensitivity.
Missions.Tag team: Every time an enemy is killed, all players must return to their spawn.
Missions.Touchdown: All players must rush the enemy spawn, the last player to arrive get executed.
Missions.Rat king: The last player on the leaderboard joins the enemy team. They are given 20 seconds to leave before being targeted by the team.
Missions.Moshpit: All players must run into each other at random so as to block each other.
Missions.The floor is lava: All players must get onto an object within 10 seconds of the start of the round, once in place they cannot touch the ground anymore.
Missions.Feetfinder: All players must put their feet on their desk.
Missions.Locked-in: All players must get as close as possible to their monitor.
